title: Spriggan Parameters
description: Spriggan is a pipeline used for assembly of bacterial whole genome sequence data and identification of antibiotic resistance genes.

reads.description: directory containing gz reads in fastq/fq format

name_split_on.description: character to split sequencing names, useful for shorten sequencing result identifiers

selected_genes.description: list of AMR genes that are of particular interest, default: 'NDM|OXA|KPC|IMP|VIM'

qualitytrimscore.description: quality score used for bbduk trimming, default: 10

minlength.description: minimum length of a passing read, default: 10

test.description: set to true to test the workflow using sequences from NCBI
